Articles.Content: Hey, i cant select a part in my VAB because idk. Plz help thx.
You need to select a Manned Command Pod or a Probe Core to begin placing most of the parts available.

Is the part you want grayed out? Are all the parts grayed out? Have you already placed some parts to make a craft? Which preset are you in?

A picture would help -- even just a cell phone pic of your screen. Instructions on how to post pictures are in the FAQ on this forum.
Console question moved to the console subforum.
